body: Farewell Mars Group Kenya, the Kenyan equivalent of Wikileaks: "While the world awaits the release of more cable from Wikileaks, some unfortunate news comes from Kenya where the equivalent of Wikileaks – the anti-corruption watchdog Mars Group Kenya - inexplicably took down their website in mid December."
original_body: Farewell Mars Group Kenya, the Kenyan equivalent of Wikileaks: "While the world awaits the release of more cable from Wikileaks, some unfortunate news comes from Kenya where the equivalent of Wikileaks – the anti-corruption watchdog Mars Group Kenya - inexplicably took down their website in mid December."
title: Kenya: Farewell Kenya's "Wikileaks"

sentence: Farewell Mars Group Kenya, the Kenyan equivalent of Wikileaks: "While the world awaits the release of more cable from Wikileaks, some unfortunate news comes from Kenya where the equivalent of Wikileaks – the anti-corruption watchdog Mars Group Kenya - inexplicably took down their website in mid December."
